Name: Fount Charm
LongDescription: Slightly boosts Special Attack and Special Defense. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Azurill, Marill, and Azumarill.  Swap an Azuri-Dew and an Azuri-Card for a Fount Charm at the Croagunk Swap Shop.  See what happens if you collect all three of these items!
